issues.description: The problem statement specifies a method named addToStockIngredients in the Stock class with the signature (StockIngredient): void, as per the UML diagram. However, the template repository implements a method named addItem with the same signature, while the solution repository uses the method name addToStockIngredients. This discrepancy could confuse students, as they might not know whether to rename the existing method in the template or implement a new one, potentially leading them to deviate from the intended design described in the problem statement.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the method in the template repository from addItem to addToStockIngredients to align with the problem statement's UML diagram, ensuring students can implement the design without confusion while preserving the educational intent of modifying the Stock class.
